column2: Anchiano Therapeutics Ltd, formerly known as ABioCancell Therapeutics Inc, is a Israel-based biopharmaceutical company. The Company specializes in the development of patient oriented targeted therapy for the treatment of a wide range of cancers. Its therapeutic and diagnostic technology, BC-819, constitutes a search and destroys paradigm for the targeted destruction of cancer cells with no effect on surrounding tissue and no observed side effects for long-term, safe treatment and prevention of cancer. The patient oriented targeted therapy approach is based on the identification of particular genes that are expressed only in tumors.
1/3 High-Tech Village, Givat Ram, PO Box 45032
